hero.title: Anx Reader
hero.subtitle: The Ultimate Reading Experience
hero.description: A powerful, elegant, and feature-rich e-book reader that transforms your digital reading journey.

bookshelf.title: Elegant Bookshelf Design
bookshelf.description: Clean and refined interface for your digital library. Organize your books with customizable collections and enjoy a visually pleasing reading environment.

personalize.title: Personalized Reading
personalize.description: Customize your reading experience from fonts to themes. Adjust text size, line spacing, margins, and choose from light, dark, or sepia themes to reduce eye strain.

analytics.title: Data Insights
analytics.description: Track your reading progress and understand your habits with detailed statistics. Monitor your reading speed, time spent, and completion rates to improve your reading habits.

notes.title: Highlights & Notes
notes.description: Easily mark important points and review key insights. Create color-coded highlights, add detailed notes, and export your annotations for reference or sharing.

aiChat.title: AI Conversation
aiChat.description: Interact with your books to gain deeper insights. Ask questions about the content, get summaries, and explore themes with our intelligent AI assistant powered by multiple models.

contextMenu.title: Convenient Operations
contextMenu.description: Powerful context menu for intuitive and efficient actions. Access dictionary definitions, translations, web search, and more with a simple long-press gesture.

customization.title: Complete Customization
customization.description: Rich style settings to create your perfect reading environment. Fine-tune every aspect of your reading experience with advanced typography controls and layout options.

sync.title: Seamless Synchronization
sync.description: Access your data and notes anywhere across all your devices. Keep your library, reading progress, bookmarks, and annotations in sync with secure cloud integration.

direct.title: Direct Download
direct.note: Note: iOS and macOS versions require manual signing or developer account

footer.description: Transform your reading experience with Anx Reader
